body_html: As a PS, one would expect that tiling with a multiple of 0 would give an empty tensor as result. But in fact, tf.tile(1.,[0]) produces an error "Shape () must have rank 1". And again, tf.rank([0]) returns 1.
body_text: As a PS, one would expect that tiling with a multiple of 0 would give an empty tensor as result.  But in fact, tf.tile(1.,[0]) produces an error "Shape () must have rank 1".  And again, tf.rank([0]) returns 1.
body: As a PS, one would expect that tiling with a multiple of 0 would give an empty tensor as result.  But in fact, tf.tile(1.,[0]) produces an error "Shape () must have rank 1".  And again, tf.rank([0]) returns 1.
